env HOME=$WORK/home

gunk convert util.proto
cmp util.gunk util.gunk.golden

-- util.proto --
syntax = "proto3";

package util;

message Error {
	// error_code is an error code,
	// the second line should not be changed
	string error_code = 1;
}

-- util.gunk.golden --
package util

type Error struct {
	// ErrorCode is an error code,
	// the second line should not be changed
	ErrorCode string `pb:"1" json:"error_code"`
}
